body_content.explanation: an organization that aims to make money in order to serve a useful social purpose:
examples: By selling goods and services in the open market, social enterprises create employment and reinvest their profits back into their business or the local community.
MCG Jazz was a social enterprise supporting youth education programmes.

body_content.explanation: the activity of running organizations that aim to make money in order to serve a useful social purpose:
examples: The combination of global awareness with the chance to make money to do more good is simply an example of social enterprise at its best.
